trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, represents the results of the authorization policies that have been evaluated.
trans-unit.target: Representerer resultatene av godkjenning policyer som er evaluert når overstyres i en avledet klasse.

trans-unit.source: Claims are added to an EvaluationContext by authorization policies.
trans-unit.target: Krav legges til en EvaluationContext av policyer for godkjenning.

trans-unit.source: An authorization policy takes a set of claims, such as those found in a security token, and adds additional claims based on the current set.
trans-unit.target: En policy for godkjenning tar et sett med krav, for eksempel de som finnes i en sikkerhetskode og legger til flere krav basert på gjeldende sett.

trans-unit.source: For instance, an authorization policy might evaluate a claim that contains the date of birth and add a claim that states the user is over 21 years old and add an Over21 claim to the EvaluationContext.
trans-unit.target: For eksempel kan en policy for godkjenning vurdere et krav som inneholder Fødselsdato og Legg til et krav om brukeren er over 21 år og legge til en Over21 krav til EvaluationContext.

trans-unit.source: Classes that implement the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Policy.IAuthorizationPolicy> interface do not authorize users, but they enable the <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceAuthorizationManager> class to do so.
trans-unit.target: Klasser som implementerer i <xref:System.IdentityModel.Policy.IAuthorizationPolicy>grensesnittet ikke har godkjent brukere, men de gjør det mulig for <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceAuthorizationManager>klassen for å gjøre so.</xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceAuthorizationManager> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Policy.IAuthorizationPolicy>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceAuthorizationManager> calls the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Policy.IAuthorizationPolicy.Evaluate%2A> method for each authorization policy in effect.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceAuthorizationManager>kall av <xref:System.IdentityModel.Policy.IAuthorizationPolicy.Evaluate%2A>metode for hver authorization-policy for øyeblikket.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Policy.IAuthorizationPolicy.Evaluate%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceAuthorizationManager>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Policy.IAuthorizationPolicy.Evaluate%2A> method determines whether additional claims should be added for the user based on the current claims.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.IdentityModel.Policy.IAuthorizationPolicy.Evaluate%2A>metoden bestemmer om ytterligere krav må legges til for brukeren som er basert på gjeldende krav.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Policy.IAuthorizationPolicy.Evaluate%2A>

trans-unit.source: An authorization policy's <xref:System.IdentityModel.Policy.IAuthorizationPolicy.Evaluate%2A> method may be called multiple times, as claims are added to the EvaluationContext by other authorization policies.
trans-unit.target: En godkjenning policy <xref:System.IdentityModel.Policy.IAuthorizationPolicy.Evaluate%2A>metoder kan kalles flere ganger, som krav er lagt til i EvaluationContext av andre authorization-policyer.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Policy.IAuthorizationPolicy.Evaluate%2A>

trans-unit.source: When all authorization policies in effect are done, the <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceAuthorizationManager> class makes authorization decisions based upon the final set of claims.
trans-unit.target: Når alle authorization-policyer i bruk er ferdig, den <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceAuthorizationManager>klassen gjør godkjenning avgjørelsene som er basert på det siste settet med krav.</xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceAuthorizationManager>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceAuthorizationManager> class then creates an <xref:System.IdentityModel.Policy.AuthorizationContext> that contains an immutable set of claims that reflects these authorization decisions.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceAuthorizationManager>klassen oppretter deretter et <xref:System.IdentityModel.Policy.AuthorizationContext>som inneholder et uforanderlig sett med krav som gjenspeiler disse godkjenning avgjørelsene.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Policy.AuthorizationContext> </xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceAuthorizationManager>

trans-unit.source: An evaluation context contains a set of <xref:System.IdentityModel.Claims.ClaimSet> objects: an expiration time, which specifies the span of time during which the evaluation context is valid, and a unique identifier.
trans-unit.target: Konteksten for en inneholder et sett med <xref:System.IdentityModel.Claims.ClaimSet>objekter: en utløpsdato som angir tidsintervallet som evalueringen konteksten er gyldig, og en unik identifikator.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Claims.ClaimSet>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Policy.EvaluationContext"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Policy.EvaluationContext"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: Adds a set of claims to the evaluation context.
trans-unit.target: Legger til et sett med krav til konteksten.

trans-unit.source: The claims are added to the set of claims contained within the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Policy.EvaluationContext.ClaimSets%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Krav er lagt til i settet med krav innenfor den <xref:System.IdentityModel.Policy.EvaluationContext.ClaimSets%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Policy.EvaluationContext.ClaimSets%2A>

trans-unit.source: Each time the AddClaimSet method is called to add claims to the evaluation context, the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Policy.EvaluationContext.Generation%2A> property should be incremented.
trans-unit.target: Hver gang metoden AddClaimSet kalles for å legge til krav til i konteksten for evaluering av <xref:System.IdentityModel.Policy.EvaluationContext.Generation%2A>egenskapen skal økes.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Policy.EvaluationContext.Generation%2A>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Policy.IAuthorizationPolicy"></xref> that represents the authorization policy that is adding claims to the evaluation context.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Policy.IAuthorizationPolicy"> </xref> som representerer godkjenning policyen som legger til krav til konteksten.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Claims.ClaimSet"></xref> that contains a set of claims.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Claims.ClaimSet"> </xref> som inneholder et sett med krav.

trans-unit.source: Gets a read-only collection of <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Claims.ClaimSet"></xref> objects that contains the claims added by authorization policies that have been evaluated.
trans-unit.target: Henter en skrivebeskyttet samling <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Claims.ClaimSet"> </xref> objekter som inneholder krav som er lagt til av godkjenning policyer som er evaluert.

trans-unit.source: To add claims to this collection, for example from an authorization policy, use the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Policy.EvaluationContext.AddClaimSet%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: For å legge til krav til denne samlingen, for eksempel fra en policy for godkjenning, kan du bruke den <xref:System.IdentityModel.Policy.EvaluationContext.AddClaimSet%2A>metoden.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Policy.EvaluationContext.AddClaimSet%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ReadOnlyCollection%601> objects that contains the claims added by authorization policies that have been evaluated.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ReadOnlyCollection%601> objekter som inneholder krav som er lagt til av godkjenning policyer som er evaluert.

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of times that claims have been added to the evaluation context.
trans-unit.target: Henter hvor mange ganger krav er lagt til i konteksten.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceAuthorizationManager> class uses the Generation property to determine if another evaluation round is required.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceAuthorizationManager>klassen bruker egenskapen generering til å fastslå om en annen evalueringen rund er nødvendig.</xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceAuthorizationManager>

trans-unit.source: Each time an authorization policy calls the `AddToTarget` method to add claims to the evaluation context, the Generation property is incremented.
trans-unit.target: Hver gang en policy for godkjenning kaller den `AddToTarget` metode for å legge til krav til evalueringen-konteksten egenskapen generering økes.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceAuthorizationManager> class examines the Generation property after calling the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Policy.IAuthorizationPolicy.Evaluate%2A> method on all authorization policies again.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceAuthorizationManager>klassen undersøker egenskapen generering etter kall av <xref:System.IdentityModel.Policy.IAuthorizationPolicy.Evaluate%2A>-metoden på alle authorization-policyer på nytt.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Policy.IAuthorizationPolicy.Evaluate%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceAuthorizationManager>

trans-unit.source: If the Generation property has been incremented during evaluation, the <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceAuthorizationManager> class calls the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Policy.IAuthorizationPolicy.Evaluate%2A> method on any authorization policies that returned `false` the last time the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Policy.IAuthorizationPolicy.Evaluate%2A> method was called on that authorization policy.
trans-unit.target: Hvis egenskapen generering er økt under evaluering, den <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceAuthorizationManager>klasse kall av <xref:System.IdentityModel.Policy.IAuthorizationPolicy.Evaluate%2A>-metoden på godkjenning policyer som returnerte `false` sist den <xref:System.IdentityModel.Policy.IAuthorizationPolicy.Evaluate%2A>metoden ble kalt for denne.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Policy.IAuthorizationPolicy.Evaluate%2A> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Policy.IAuthorizationPolicy.Evaluate%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceAuthorizationManager>

trans-unit.source: The number of times that claims have been added to the evaluation context.
trans-unit.target: Antall ganger krav er lagt til i konteksten.

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of non-claim properties associated with this <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Policy.EvaluationContext"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Henter en samling av ikke-krav egenskaper som er knyttet til dette <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Policy.EvaluationContext"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The classes in the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors> namespace that implement the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Policy.IAuthorizationPolicy> interface (authorization policies) add a property named `Identities` to the.<xref:System.IdentityModel.Policy.AuthorizationContext.Properties%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: Klassene i den <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors>navneområdet som implementerer den <xref:System.IdentityModel.Policy.IAuthorizationPolicy>grensesnittet (authorization policyer) Legg til en egenskap med navnet `Identities` til den.<xref:System.IdentityModel.Policy.AuthorizationContext.Properties%2A> samlingen.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Policy.AuthorizationContext.Properties%2A> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Policy.IAuthorizationPolicy> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors>

trans-unit.source: The `Identities` property contains an object of type <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IList%601> that contains one or more <xref:System.Security.Principal.IIdentity> instances that represent identity information that is provided by the authorization policies.
trans-unit.target: Den `Identities` egenskapen inneholder et objekt av typen <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IList%601>som inneholder ett eller flere <xref:System.Security.Principal.IIdentity>forekomstene som representerer identitetsinformasjon som er angitt av authorization-policyer.</xref:System.Security.Principal.IIdentity> </xref:System.Collections.Generic.IList%601>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary%602> that specifies a collection of non-claim properties.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary%602> som angir en samling av ikke-krav egenskaper.

trans-unit.source: Sets the date and time at which this <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Policy.EvaluationContext"></xref> is no longer valid.
trans-unit.target: Angir datoen og klokkeslettet for som <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Policy.EvaluationContext"> </xref> er ikke lenger gyldig.

trans-unit.source: Calling the RecordExpirationTime method multiple times only has an effect if the `expirationTime` parameter has a value that is earlier than the previously specified value.
trans-unit.target: Kaller metoden RecordExpirationTime flere ganger bare har en effekt hvis den `expirationTime` parameteren har en verdi som er eldre enn den tidligere angitte verdien.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.DateTime> value that indicates the date and time when this <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Policy.AuthorizationContext"></xref> object is no longer valid.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.DateTime>verdi som angir dato og klokkeslett når dette <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Policy.AuthorizationContext"> </xref> objektet er ikke lenger gyldig.</xref:System.DateTime>
